title: UchihaSarada
author: UchihaSarada
content: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3537904I reported to nuke the user too.

comments.author: mindrust
comments.body: Quote from: UchihaSarada on February 28, 2023, 06:48:57 AMhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3537904I reported to nuke the user too.The forum admins don’t have any nukes I am afraid. You’d have to go to Putin or Biden for that but I don’t think either of them would start a nuclear war over a crypto scammer. The world went crazy without a doubt, I agree with that but still, we are not that crazy, yet.I am sorry. Nobody’s nuking anybody here.

comments.author: PrimeNumber7
comments.body: Quote from: mindrust on February 28, 2023, 06:55:14 AMQuote from: UchihaSarada on February 28, 2023, 06:48:57 AMhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3537904I reported to nuke the user too.The forum admins don’t have any nukes I am afraid. You’d have to go to Putin or Biden for that but I don’t think either of them would start a nuclear war over a crypto scammer. The world went crazy without a doubt, I agree with that but still, we are not that crazy, yet.I am sorry. Nobody’s nuking anybody here.I am sorry mindrust, but the mods have an unlimited amount of nukes available to them. When a mod nukes a newbie, all their posts will be removed and they will get banned, all in one click.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: PrimeNumber7 on February 28, 2023, 07:11:24 AMQuote from: mindrust on February 28, 2023, 06:55:14 AMQuote from: UchihaSarada on February 28, 2023, 06:48:57 AMhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3537904I reported to nuke the user too.The forum admins don’t have any nukes I am afraid. You’d have to go to Putin or Biden for that but I don’t think either of them would start a nuclear war over a crypto scammer. The world went crazy without a doubt, I agree with that but still, we are not that crazy, yet.I am sorry. Nobody’s nuking anybody here.I am sorry mindrust, but the mods have an unlimited amount of nukes available to them. When a mod nukes a newbie, all their posts will be removed and they will get banned, all in one click. There are actually a whole lot of things I need to know that I've been missing out and nuking is definitely one of them.It seems I get to learn something new almost every day of my stay on the forum and it's becoming more of fun over here as there are always something new to learn.@Op why are you asking moderator nuke the newbie userI really need to know because it seems I've got a whole lot of works to do over here and I need to get to work to getting the community clean.

comments.author: UchihaSarada
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on February 28, 2023, 08:01:35 AM@Op why are you asking moderator nuke the newbie userScam tool.Duplicate topics in two boards.Quote from: mprep on July 21, 2014, 05:27:51 PM12. No duplicate posting in multiple boards (except for re-posting topics in the local language boards if they're translated and re-posting marketplace topics in the altcoin boards if altcoins are accepted).

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: UchihaSarada on February 28, 2023, 06:48:57 AMI reported to nuke the user too.The user can be nuked if he breaks badly some rules. If you've found him plagiarizing, for example, and you can prove that, he's as good as gone.But just by asking nicely, you won't obtain anything. Even more, if it's a case of scam, that's not moderated, so your actual choice is to make (in Scam Accusations, see the reporting format there) a new topic proving his scam, to make people tag him. It won't nuke him, but the trust feedback will be visible and people will start avoiding him.Quote from: UchihaSarada on February 28, 2023, 08:09:01 AMDuplicate topics in two boards.That's not enough. Duplicated posts are reported and removed. But nothing more.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: UchihaSarada on February 28, 2023, 08:09:01 AMQuote from: Obari on February 28, 2023, 08:01:35 AM@Op why are you asking moderator nuke the newbie userScam tool.Duplicate topics in two boards.Report the post/thread he made and let the moderators do the rest. Any hacking or malware tool detected posts were eventually be deleted and hammered, nuking an account is not that simply because they create a 1 or 2 post containing some "scam tool" unless it contains malware.

comments.author: UchihaSarada
comments.body: Thank you.Moderator only deleted the duplicate thread and did not nuke that user.

comments.author: UchihaSarada
comments.body: Thanks mod.That user likely was nuked.
